Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.EmilyDye_Text: {Text} Anyone who ships 25 {DyeItem:TextPlural} on time will earn a reward!
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.EmilyDye_RE_Tex: I need some fresh {DyeItem:TextPlural} to do some custom dyes.
I want to study how {DyeItem:TextPlural}' colors are behaving on fabric for a future project.
